object:
`TextureBase` is the base class for `Texture` and `TexturePack` classes. It provides a common functionaly to texture related classes.

<ul>
<li>TextureBase.CLAMP = "clamp"</li>
<li>TextureBase.REPEAT = "repeat"</li>
</ul>
